text.0: godserving men o sovran of the forest with heavenly meath at sacrifice anoint thee.
text.1: grant wealth to us when thou art standing upright as when reposing on this mothers bosom.
text.2: set up to eastward of the fire enkindled accepting prayer that wastes not rich in hero.
text.3: driving far from us poverty and famine lift thyself up to bring us great good fortune.
text.4: lord of the forest raise thyself up on the loftiest spot of earth.
text.5: give splendour fixt and measured well to him who brings the sacrifice.
text.6: wellrobed enveloped he is come the youthful springing to life his glory waxeth greater.
text.7: contemplative in mind and godadoring sages of high intelligence upraise him.
text.8: sprung up he rises in the days fair weather increasing in the menfrequented synod.
text.9: with song the wise and skilful consecrate him his voice the godadoring singer utters.
text.10: ye whom religious men have firmly planted thou forest sovran whom the axe hath fashioned.
text.11: let those the stakes divine which here are standing be fain to grant us wealth with store of children.
text.12: o men who lift the ladles up these hewn and planted in the ground.
text.13: bringing a blessing to the field shall bear our precious gift to gods.
text.14: Ādityas rudras vasus careful leaders earth heaven and prthivi and airs midregion.
text.15: accordant deities shall bless our worship and make our sacrifices ensign lofty.
text.16: like swans that flee in lengthened line the pillars have come to us arrayed in brilliant coiour.
text.17: they lifted up on high by sages eastward go forth as gods to the gods dwellingplaces.
text.18: those stakes upon the earth with rings that deck them seem to the eye like horns of horned creatures.
text.19: or as upraised by priests in invocation let them assist us in the rush to battle.
text.20: lord of the wood rise with a hundred branches with thousand branches may we rise to greatness.
text.21: tlou whom this hatchct with an edge well whetted for great felicity hath brought before us.
